title: Can't hide tooltips in ingame store.
body:
Pretty simple issue. If I click on the item before I have met the requirements to buy it I get the tooltip that shows me which requirements I don't meet. That's very annoying and I have searched for the option to turn this off. I have "show new player tooltips" turned off. 
I have this turned off on my main but on both EUW and NA new accounts I can't seem to find how to turn this off.[](https://i.gyazo.com/6fcddd3c85b54bf0a18a94a1008b3bb2.png)

As you can see, this dialog prevents from buying the component items quickly.

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm not sure that the new player tooltips would affect the item tooltips or not. If you could shoot me a screenshot of what you're seeing I should be able to find a definitive answer!!

https://gyazo.com/6fcddd3c85b54bf0a18a94a1008b3bb2

I thought I did in the last post

Hmmmmm I'm not actually sure that it's even possible to turn that tooltip off. Without those tooltips, some players wouldn't be able to figure out how to build certain items or know how much more gold they need.
I don't have them on my main account, and other people don't have them as well.
That is definitely odd then. Go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys might be able to get that figured out!
